bib.title: Quantifying layer similarity in multiplex networks: a systematic study
bib.author: Br{\'o}dka, Piotr and Chmiel, Anna and Magnani, Matteo and Ragozini, Giancarlo
bib.abstract: Computing layer similarities is an important way of characterizing multiplex networks because various static properties and dynamic processes depend on the relationships between layers. We provide a taxonomy and experimental evaluation of approaches to compare layers in multiplex networks. Our taxonomy includes, systematizes and extends existing approaches, and is complemented by a set of practical guidelines on how to apply them.
